text: Christmas was just around the corner, and it was that time of year when Christmas songs were playing even in Gosha Village.

name: Aishu Hebiko
text: Ahh, there you are! Fuma-chan, over here!
I had been summoned out of the blue by Hebiko, so I had come to Maesaki City, a smaller city that was the one nearest to Gosha Village.

name: Me
text: Christmas lights? Why do we have to go out of our way to see something like that during the busy time right before exams...

name: Hebiko
text: "Gohrenarie" only lasts until Christmas, so it would be over by the time exams end! There'd be no chance to go!
Hebiko had made me come because she wanted to go see the "Gohrenarie" Christmas light festival that was starting this year in the city.

name: Hebiko
text: One more time, Hebiko will lend you her secret notebook full of important points for the test later. Fuma-chan, you're going to pull an all-nighter anyways, right?

name: Me
text: Ugh, th-that's... Sheesh, seems like I don't have a choice...
Hebiko had seen right through me. I couldn't resist her secret notebook and obediently started to walk after her.
The December sunset came early in the evening. We killed time by walking through the streets until the "Gorenarie" Christmas lights were scheduled to come on.
All the shops had put up decorations to celebrate the arrival of Christmas, each more dazzling than the last in its own way.

name: Hebiko
text: Ehehe, so wonderful♪ ...But still, winter is quite warm this year. You can even wear short sleeves.

name: Me
text: Apparently it's a record-breaking warm winter. But, no matter how you look at it, wearing summer clothes is...

name: Hebiko
text: Oh, octopuses are always in the water. Wearing a t-shirt even in 10℃ weather would be no problem at all~

name: Me
text: Fine, but don't catch a cold. Anyways, this place is chock full of couples everywhere you look, bleh...

name: Hebiko
text: Oh my, Hebiko and Fuma-chan might look like one too♪
Hebiko said and tugged on my sleeve.

name: Me
text: Stop it, dummy, you'll stretch it!

name: Hebiko
text: Ahaha! You're a real mood killer, Fuma-chan♪
◇Go... to helllll...◇

name: Me
text: Hm?
At that moment, I thought I had heard a growling voice from somewhere and looked around.

name: Hebiko
text: What's the matter, Fuma-chan?

name: Me
text: Well, just now... I heard a really scary voice...
◇Go... go to helllll...!!!◇

name: Me
text: Again!

name: Hebiko
text: Eh!?
At that moment, a cold wind suddenly blew between us. Andー
◇Go to hell... go to helllll!!! All you stuuuupid couples!!!◇

name: Hebiko
text: Ehh!?

name: Me
text: What the hell is this?!?
A huge, evil-looking snowman was blocking the path directly behind us.
You there, watch ouuuuuuut!!!

name: Me
text: What now!?

name: Hebiko
text: Ah! Fuma-chan, move!
I jumped out of the way as if I had been knocked back by Hebiko, and a large fireball headed toward the snowman.

name: Me
text: Ooh!?

The fireball was about to hit the snowman perfectlyー
but just before impact, it suddenly shrank until it fizzled out completely.
Ahh!! I failed again! Maybe the incantation was wrong? Um... Eigel Eiglyph Daas...
When I turned around, I saw a blonde girl struggling to cast a spell. While she was reading from something that looked like a cheat sheet.

name: Me
text: ...Um, was that... magic? Did you do that??
Yes, I did! I'mー
Just as the girl threw out her chest in pride, the snowman interrupted her.

name: Snowman
text: ◇Mwa... mwahaha!! That was some pretty lousy magic! You irritating little witch!!◇
Silence! Your evil deeds end here! In the name of a merry Christmas, I punish you!
She snapped into a perfect pose and her large breasts swayed heavily. At her feet, a white dog showed its face.

name: White Dog
text: Lilith, he's making a run for it.
During her expository interlude, the snowman had started to scramble away.

name: Lilith
text: Oh no!! Why you, stop right therrrrre!!

name: Me
text: Ah, wait a second! What the hell is going on!? And what the hell is with that talking dog...

name: White Dog
text: I'm not a dog! I'm the Ancient Dragon of...

name: Lilith
text: I'm Lilith Abel Bindernagel! The Great Witch, renowned throughout the Devildom... is my grandmother! And this is my companion, the talking dog Berylic!
Berylic, the talking dog, er... ancient dragon, sighed in resignation.

name: Berylic
text: No matter, we best look for the Snowfiend...

name: Hebiko
text: The Snowfiend? Do you mean that snowman?

name: Lilith
text: Yes! That thing is an evil spirit that appears in winter once every ten years to ruin Christmas.

name: Hebiko
text: To ruin Christmas? Why?

name: Berylic
text: That's because...
This is how it went according to Lilith and Berylic.

name: Berylic
text: Christmas has both a light side and a dark side. Everyone has at least one sad Christmas-related memory.
For instance, being the only one not invited to a Christmas party among friends, or feeling lonely when your parents couldn't be around because of work.
Among all these sad memories, the worst were always about relationships. Confessing your feelings and being rejected was still on the lighter side of things.

But things likeー
finding out that someone you thought was your sweetheart spent Christmas with someone else...
It was no wonder that those who had these terrible experiences came to hate and resent Christmas itself.

name: Berylic
text: Those dark memories have gathered and manifested into an evil spirit, which then possessed that snowman. A conglomeration of resentment, if you will.

name: Lilith
text: And that's why it tries to ruin Christmas, and it especially attacks happy-looking couples.

name: Hebiko
text: So that's why Hebiko and Fuma-chan got attacked.

name: Me
text: That's one frightening spirit. It's not like I can't understand how it feels though.

name: Berylic
text: Furthermore, while the evil spirit amasses grudges, it becomes more powerful as it feeds on snow and cold air.

name: Hebiko
text: Cold air? Oh, is that why it's not cold at all?!

name: Lilith
text: If we don't stop it by Christmas, the whole world will drown in sorrow and resentment! Vegetables will also die off from the warm winter!

name: Hebiko
text: Ehh!? But then no one would be able to make hot pot or osechi!

name: Lilith
text: Worry not, for I, the Great Witch Lilith, will do whatever it takes! This is also part of my witch training after all.

name: Lilith
text: We need to determine its location first. Um... so a dowsing spell... Saga Shimohno Wanan...
The self-proclaimed Great Witch opened up some kind of map and began chanting a spell while clutching a pendulum.

name: Hebiko
text: No need for any of that, Hebiko will find him with these, lickety-split!
Hebiko, who had transformed into an octopus at some point, twitched her suckers.

name: Me
text: Hey!? Transforming into an octopus in the middle of the city... I mean, your scent detection as an octopus is amazing and all, but still.

name: Hebiko
text: It's fine. With Lilith-chan and her barky-buddy around, they'll think this is some kind of character.

name: Berylic
text: B-Barky-buddy...
She was right, the people passing by didn't seem particularly surprised.

name: Hebiko
text: *Sniff, sniff* ...Hebiko smells snow from over there! He ran that way!
Hebiko wriggled her tentacles, whose suckers boasted a sense of smell on par with highly responsive sensors.

name: Lilith
text: Wh-Whoa! Those tentacles, could it be that you're the legendary archdemon, Nairuato-or-whatever-sama!?

name: Berylic
text: Ohh, that's reassuring. Please assist us in defeating that evil spirit.

name: Hebiko
text: Demon? These tentacles are just normal octopus legs... But, sure thing on the assistance though! Right, Fuma-chan?

name: Me
text: Guess we have to. The couples can get blown to smithereens for all I care, but I'll do it for the delicious hot pot!
We set off running, following behind the legendary archdemon, er... Hebiko.
We reached the middle of the city. This area had quickly flourished after Maesaki City had started bringing in businesses as part of the new development plan.

name: Hebiko
text: It should be somewhere around here... There's kind of a sweet smell mixed in too, so it's kind of tough to tell.

name: Me
text: Hm? There's a crowd of people over there. That's...

name: Akiyama Rinko
text: Christmas cakes! Now taking pre-orders!

name: Shinohara Mari
text: Yes, yes~ please form a line! We kindly ask that you fill in your order form.

name: Hebiko
text: Rinko-senpai... and Mari-chan!!!

name: Me
text: Mari-chan... oh, you mean Shinohara.
Shinohara Mari was in the same year as us and was the representative of another class. Despite her looks, she was a powerful Earth Art user.
Hebiko was also class representative, so she must have met her many times.

name: Me
text: Those outfits...? Are they doing Christmas part-time jobs? That's a long line of people, business must be booming.

name: Lilith
text: And it's nothing but men standing in line.

name: Berylic
text: By all appearances, they seem like guys without girlfriends, but I suppose they are just very fond of cake.
Then Rinko caught sight of us.

name: Rinko
text: Ohh, what are you two doing here?

name: Mari
text: Fuma-kun and Hebiko-chan~! Did you come here to pre-order a cake?

name: Me
text: Ah, no, we...

name: Rinko
text: Please put in an order if you'd like. It might be because of the warm weather, but cake sales have been a bit slow.

name: Me
text: Even though there's that many people standing in line?

name: Rinko
text: Last year there were three times this many. Thanks to that, our outfits have been getting skimpier at the same time.

name: Me
text: Th-That sounds tough... But sorry, Rinko-senpai, we are actually trying to track down the cause of this warm winter.

name: Rinko
text: The cause of the warm winter?

name: Hebiko
text: Fuma-chan!!! Over there!
Hebiko suddenly pulled on my arm, and when I looked in the direction that the toe(?) of her octopus leg was pointingー

name: Snowfiend
text: ◇...Get blown up, normies... *Grumble*...◇

name: Me
text: Wha-!? He's standing in line!?! To order a cake!?

name: Hebiko
text: He might be comfortable since there are no normies around here.

name: Snowfiend
text: ◇...*Grumble*... *Grumble*...◇

name: Rinko
text: Ooh, so that snowman is the reason for the warm weather? It's... not a demon, so is it some sort of vengeful spirit?

name: Hebiko
text: Bravo, Rinko-senpai, you're always quick to figure things out. He's a mass of grudges against Christmas, and he's been eating up all the snow and cold air.

name: Rinko
text: I see, he sure is a nasty one.

name: Mari
text: For the sake of our pay... No, for the sake of justice, we have to stop him!
Rinko and Mari stepped out of the pre-order booth and leapt toward the Snowfiend with their Santa costumes still on.

name: Snowfiend
text: ◇Gegeh!? You all!? Crap!!!◇
The snowman quickly slipped out of line and ran.

name: Lilith
text: Stop right there!
And this was how we came to chase after the Snowfiend together with the two Santa Taimanin, the self-proclaimed Great Witch, and her talking dog companion.
